DOC.brief_summary: To assess comparative efficacy sertraline versus venlafaxine XR measure quality life .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Sertraline Versus Venlafaxine XR Treatment Major Depression
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis DSMIV Major Depressive Disorder , single episode recurrent , without psychotic feature . Additional DSMIV Axis I diagnose permitted identified secondary diagnosis . HamiltonDepression rating scale ( HAMD ; 17 item ) total score ≥18 HAMD item 1 ( depressed mood ) score ≥2 . Use antidepressant within 2 week baseline ( 4 week fluoxetine ) Current past diagnosis bipolar disorder psychotic disorder .
